0: "Welcome to TRAVEL AND DREAM, your window to the world! 🌍✈️ Join us as we explore breathtaking destinations, fascinating cultures, and unforgettable adventures. From the heart of the most vibrant metropolises to the hidden gems of nature, each episode is an invitation to discover the beauty and diversity of our planet. We share travel tips, detailed guides, and the best local experiences to help you plan your adventures. Whether you're an experienced traveler or a dreamer at home, here you'll find inspiration for your next trip. Get your passport ready and let yourself be inspired!"
